mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_id, editor_id, name, imp_uid, merchant_uid, price) VALUES (#{userId}, #{editorId}, #{name}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, user_id, name, imp_uid, merchant_uid, price, date_format(created_at,'%y-%m-%d %h:%i') as created_at FROM payment WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
